marklogic.body: I suspect my Catholic extremist Munchausen by Proxy family, despite being repulsed by my burned appearance, decided to keep me disfigured as abstinence-enforcement.Â Disfigurement was their version of a boy-crazy Rosemary Kennedy lobotomy.Â When I stopped cooperating and started using my art talent to apply corrective makeup that actually fooled a few visually impaired people to mutter compliments, my family then badgered priests, lawyers and headshrinks to have me committed for insanity.Â Their plan B was to force me on weight-, acne-inducing, tardive dyskinesia-ruining CIA-invented psychotropic drugs.Â Fortunately, their fascist venom scared Off most authorities and I escaped further mayhem.Â There is a scary tie between the development of psychotropic drugs and a nasty Georgetown University dean of psychiatry/Jesuit priest that I'll cover another time.
